languages.text: {n}Глаза Абеляра расширяются от изумления.{/n} "Сотворять... звезды? Милостью Бога-Императора, какие создания смогут жить в лучах светила, порожденного силами Архиврага?!"
{n}Abelard's eyes widen in astonishment.{/n} "Create... a star? God-Emperor's grace, what creatures could live in the light of a star born using the powers of the Archenemy?"
languages.original_text: {n}Глаза Абеляра расширяются от изумления.{/n} "Сотворять... звезды? Милостью Бога-Императора, какие создания смогут жить в лучах светила, порожденного силами Архиврага?!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard's eyes widen in astonishment.{/n} "Create... a star? God-Emperor's grace, what creatures could live in the light a star born using the powers of the Archenemy?"
{n}Abelard's eyes widen in astonishment.{/n} "Create... a star? God-Emperor's grace, what creatures could live in the light a star born using the powers of the Archenemy?"
{n}Abelard's eyes widen in astonishment.{/n} "Create... a star? God-Emperor's grace, what creatures could live in the light a star born using the powers of the Archenemy?"
{n}Abelard's eyes widen in astonishment.{/n} "Create... a star? God-Emperor's grace, what creatures could live in the light a star born using the powers of the Archenemy?"

languages.text: {n}阿贝拉德震惊地瞪大了眼睛。{/n}“创造……一颗恒星？神皇在上，那可是用混沌大敌的力量创造出来的恒星啊。若是沐浴在这样的星光之下，究竟会孕育出什么样的东西来？”
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard's eyes widen in astonishment.{/n} "Create... a star? God-Emperor's grace, what creatures could live in the light of a star born using the powers of the Archenemy?"

traits.locale_text: {n}阿贝拉德震惊地瞪大了眼睛。{/n}“创造……一颗恒星？神皇在上，那可是用混沌大敌的力量创造出来的恒星啊。若是沐浴在这样的星光之下，究竟会孕育出什么样的东西来？”

languages.text: {n}Los ojos de Abelard se abren de par en par.{/n} «¿Crear... una estrella? Por la gracia del Dios Emperador, ¿qué criaturas podrían vivir bajo la luz de una estrella nacida de los poderes del Archienemigo?».
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard's eyes widen in astonishment.{/n} "Create... a star? God-Emperor's grace, what creatures could live in the light of a star born using the powers of the Archenemy?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Los ojos de Abelard se abren de par en par.{/n} «¿Crear... una estrella? Por la gracia del Dios Emperador, ¿qué criaturas podrían vivir bajo la luz de una estrella nacida de los poderes del Archienemigo?».

languages.text: {n}アベラルドは驚いて目を丸くした。{/n}「創る…星を？皇帝の恩寵よ、渾沌の勢力の力を使って生まれた星の光の中で生きられる生き物は何なのでしょうか？」
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard's eyes widen in astonishment.{/n} "Create... a star? God-Emperor's grace, what creatures could live in the light of a star born using the powers of the Archenemy?"

traits.locale_text: {n}アベラルドは驚いて目を丸くした。{/n}「創る…星を？皇帝の恩寵よ、渾沌の勢力の力を使って生まれた星の光の中で生きられる生き物は何なのでしょうか？」

languages.text: {n}Les yeux d'Abélard s'écarquillent de stupéfaction.{/n} « Créer... un soleil ? Par la grâce de l'Empereur-Dieu, quelles créatures pourraient bien vivre de la lumière d'un soleil né des pouvoirs du Grand Ennemi ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard's eyes widen in astonishment.{/n} "Create... a star? God-Emperor's grace, what creatures could live in the light of a star born using the powers of the Archenemy?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Les yeux d'Abélard s'écarquillent de stupéfaction.{/n} « Créer... un soleil ? Par la grâce de l'Empereur-Dieu, quelles créatures pourraient bien vivre de la lumière d'un soleil né des pouvoirs du Grand Ennemi ? »

languages.text: {n}Abelards Augen weiten sich erstaunt.{/n} "Einen Stern ... erschaffen? Bei der Gnade des Gottimperators, welche Kreaturen können im Licht eines Sterns leben, der mit den Kräften des Erzfeinds geboren wurde?"
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard's eyes widen in astonishment.{/n} "Create... a star? God-Emperor's grace, what creatures could live in the light of a star born using the powers of the Archenemy?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelards Augen weiten sich erstaunt.{/n} "Einen Stern ... erschaffen? Bei der Gnade des Gottimperators, welche Kreaturen können im Licht eines Sterns leben, der mit den Kräften des Erzfeinds geboren wurde?"

languages.text: {n}Abelard'ın gözleri hayretle açılıyor.{/n} "Yıldız... Yaratmak mı? Tanrı İmparator aşkına, Şerbaşı'nın güçleri kullanılarak yaratılan bir yıldızın ışığında hangi yaratıklar yaşayabilir ki?"
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard's eyes widen in astonishment.{/n} "Create... a star? God-Emperor's grace, what creatures could live in the light of a star born using the powers of the Archenemy?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard'ın gözleri hayretle açılıyor.{/n} "Bir... Yıldız yaratmak mı? Tanrı İmparator aşkına, Şerbaşı'nın güçleri kullanılarak yaratılmış bir yıldızın ışığında yaşayabilecek yaratıkları düşünebiliyor musunuz?"
